title: ISic001332. Epitaph
body:
1[Θ(εοῖς)] Κ(αταχθονίοις)
2[---]ος ἔζ[ησεν]
3ἔτ̣[η .]ζ μῆνε[ς ---]
4ἐπ[οίη]σεν αὐτοῦ ἡ
5σύ[μβ]ιος μνήμης
6[χ]άριν

1[..]Κ
2[---]ΟΣΕΖ[....]
3Ε.[.·]ΖΜΗΝΕ[.---]
4ΕΠ[...]ΣΕΝΑΥΤΟΥΗ
5ΣΥ[..]ΙΟΣΜΝΗΜΗΣ
6[.]ΑΡΙΝ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text based on photographs;
  • Kaibel did not read the first line

English translation

To the subterranean deities. ---os lived for -7 years, - months. His wife made (this) for his memory.

Italian translation

Agli dèi inferi. ---os visse -7 anni, - mesi. Sua moglie realizzò (questo) a sua memoria.

commentary

The epitaph presents the invocation to the subterranean deities, the name of the deceased in the lacuna, the indication of the age (partially in the lacuna) and in another sentence the dedicant (the proper name is not specified, but the relationship with the deceased is mentioned, as in IGMusPalermo 143 = ISic000797), the dedication verb and the formula μνήμης χάριν.

bibliography

  • 14.0511 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 155 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
